CirnoMod.Card.AvoidDanger.NAME: Avoid Danger
CirnoMod.Card.AvoidDanger.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block; NL otherwise gain !M! Flight.

CirnoMod.Card.FreezingAura.NAME: Freezing Aura
CirnoMod.Card.FreezingAura.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Thorns and Plated Armor until your next turn.

CirnoMod.Card.Snowfall.NAME: Snowfall
CirnoMod.Card.Snowfall.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Frozen to ALL characters. NL Exhaust.

CirnoMod.Card.FreezingWind.NAME: FreezingWind
CirnoMod.Card.FreezingWind.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage and apply !M! Frozen to ALL enemies

CirnoMod.Card.AirStrike.NAME: AirStrike
CirnoMod.Card.AirStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If Flying, deal !M! more damage.

CirnoMod.Card.QuickAttack.NAME: QuickAttack
CirnoMod.Card.QuickAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Gain !M! dexterity this turn.

CirnoMod.Card.FairyTrick.NAME: FairyTrick
CirnoMod.Card.FairyTrick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage, apply 3 vulnerable, draw !M! card, exhaust
